about_the_game:
Fight against a rogue artificial intelligence and save humanity from becoming slaves to machines! Put on your VR headset, become a Galactic Ranger, and journey into deep space. Blast through waves of robots with powerful blasters, shotguns, and other crazy weapons, just like in the classic arcade games!

Always stay prepared! Hordes of robots are relentlessly advancing, and their attacks grow more dangerous with every moment. You’ll need to use all your skills: dodge incoming enemies, activate your shield to deflect attacks, and masterfully navigate your flight through treacherous zones. Your survival depends on your reflexes and ability to handle the machine threat. It won’t be easy, but no one becomes a hero by taking the easy path!

Weapons to fight the machines! Every gun in your arsenal is unique, with its own characteristics, firing style, and tactical advantages. Choose the one that suits you best: from the devastating power of a bazooka capable of wiping out waves of enemies, to the precision and speed of a railgun that strikes targets with lightning accuracy. Decide your combat style and show the machines who’s the real ranger here!

Explore and dive into thrilling cosmic missions! Embark on adventures through perilous asteroid fields, mysterious planets with unique landscapes, and massive space stations hiding countless secrets. Each mission presents a new challenge where only your skills and strategic thinking can help overcome the threats posed by the rogue machines. Are you ready to become a hero and reclaim humanity’s control over the cosmos?

Plot

Disturbing signals are coming from the edges of explored space. Rebel robots have learned to cooperate and are building bases on uninhabited planets. Their new goal is to enslave all "bags of bones," also known as humans, under the rule of Robocracy.

The Galactic Rangers are called to deal with this new threat!

They've proven that humanity can rely on them to defend against machines. But this time, the challenge is tougher than ever — you’ll be up against upgraded robot models!

Find and stop the Robocracy before it’s too late! Defend the simple joys of human civilization: cute kittens, breakfast in bed, funny memes, and internet arguments!

Key features:

  • Survive three hardcore acts with lots of missions in the beautiful landscapes of the explored Universe

  • Survive three hardcore acts filled with missions across the beautiful landscapes of the known Universe.

  • Arm yourself with powerful blasters, shotguns, and rocket launchers.

  • New control mechanics elevate the gameplay experience to a whole new level.

  • Tackle different difficulty levels. Use shields, slow down time, plant mines — utilize every tool to reclaim control over the Universe.

  • Fight the Robocracy solo or team up with friends to take on the soulless machines.

movies.name: ROBOCRACY Takes On The Competition in VR Gaming!

name: ROBOCRACY

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit (latest Service Pack)
  • Processor: Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
  • Additional Notes: A 64-bit processor and operating system are required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit (latest Service Pack)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1080 or better
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
  • Additional Notes: A 64-bit processor and operating system are required

short_description: Take on the challenge and face off against a rogue AI bent on enslaving humanity! Strap on your VR headset, step into the boots of a Galactic Ranger, and tear through waves of robots with explosive blasters, devastating shotguns, and an insane arsenal — just like classic arcade shooters!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
